sen.j: 大妃（だいひ）とは先代の王の妃で、現王の母后。
sen.e: Daihi was the empress dowager who was an empress previously.

sen.j: しかし、王大妃と大王大妃と同じ意味で使われることもあり、王室内では中国帝国でいう皇太后の様な位置にある。
sen.e: Since Daihi was used for both the wife of a king and the wife of a great king, Daihi in the royal family had the same title as an Empress dowager in the Chinese empire.

sen.j: 王の母親であるため王が在位している間はほとんど存在していた。
sen.e: As the empress dowager was mother of the Emperor, she held the position during the duration of his reign.

sen.j: 基本的に王室の権威と安定を図ったが、その地位を利用して権力の中心に座ることもあった。
sen.e: The fundamental role of the empress dowager was to keep authority and stability in the royal family, but some of them rose to power by utilizing their title.
